brand_identity.name: RIGHTNAME
brand_identity.emotional_tone: High-end Consulting (McKinsey/Bain aesthetic). Trustworthy, sophisticated, evidence-based.
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Editorial warmth.
Content is King: Evidence-first design. Data is the hero.
Contrast: High contrast for readability and authority.

primary.name: Midnight Navy
primary.usage: Primary text, strong borders, active states

gradients.rule: No full-screen gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.

rules: Headings (H1-H3) MUST use the Serif font family.
Body text MUST use the Sans-serif font family.

spacing_system.philosophy: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 where others use p-4.

marketing.name: The Tetris Grid
marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Never fill 100% perfectly. Leave breathing room.

dashboard.name: The Control Room
dashboard.rules: Dense but clear. Every pixel utilized. No jagged bottoms.

buttons.style: Sharp or Pill (choose one and stick to it).

cards.style: Minimalist. 1px border. No shadow or very subtle shadow.

inputs.class: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

navigation.style: Sticky, Glassmorphism if content scrolls under.
navigation.class: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain/noise on solid backgrounds to avoid 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (e.g., border-slate-200) for structure.

office.alt: Modern minimalist office space with glass partitions

team.alt: Diverse group of professionals standing together

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds unless explicitly requested.
DO NOT center align the app container. Use left alignment for text readability.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use the specified Serif font.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state with a visible color change.
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-end consulting brand evaluation system. Adhere strictly to the 'Architect' persona. Use the provided color palette and typography. Prioritize whitespace and evidence-based design. Use the provided image URLs for their respective categories. Do not ask clarifying questions; use your best judgment based on these guidelines.
